original_text: And Machir took to wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim, whose sister's name was Maachah;) and the name of the second was Zelophehad: and Zelophehad had daughters.
korean_text: 마길은 ?빔과 숩빔의 누이 마아가라 하는 이에게 장가 들었더라 므낫세의 둘째 아들의 이름은 슬로브핫이니 슬로브핫은 딸들만 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: And Machir took to wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim,
sentences.korean_translation: 마길이 학빔과 숩빔의 여동생을 아내로 맞았고

sentences.original_text: and the name of the second was Zelophehad:
